primary_text: You’ve seen us before 👀 Now feel the difference. Our ultra-soft, breathable undergarments are designed for all–day comfort, whether you’re at work, in class, or just chilling at home.
visual_concept: Vertical UGC-style video of a young woman unboxing, trying, and reacting to the product in her bedroom mirror with quick, honest reactions and close-up product shots.
rationale: Targets high-intent retargeting users with authentic creator-style content, leveraging the strong ROAS and CTR already seen from UGC in warm audiences.

primary_text: Don’t compromise between comfort and confidence. Our undergarments are crafted with soft, breathable fabric that moves with you — from morning rush to midnight scroll.
visual_concept: Clean studio image of the product laid out on a soft fabric background with soft lighting, plus a small badge that says 'All-day comfort • No marks • No itch'.
offer: Free shipping on your next order
rationale: Static images already perform strongly; this creative focuses on clarity of value for users who visited but did not purchase.

primary_text: Most-loved everyday undergarments, now in breathable, lightweight fabric. Perfect for college, office, travel — and everything in between.
visual_concept: Lifestyle image of a young woman getting ready in front of a mirror, with the product subtly visible and a small overlay text: 'Everyday Comfort • Zero Drama'.
rationale: Designed for lookalike audiences that resemble existing buyers, combining strong image performance with a discovery-style message.

hook: I didn’t expect this to be THIS comfortable
primary_text: "Okay, I wasn’t expecting this level of comfort 😅" – A genuine try–on review of our most popular undergarments. See why thousands of women are switching.
visual_concept: UGC selfie-style video or reel where the creator speaks directly to camera, showing before/after comparison with old vs new undergarments (comfort & fit focus).
rationale: Uses social proof and authentic reaction to attract new but high-potential lookalike users, aligned with strong UGC performance.

hook: 30 seconds to understand the comfort difference
primary_text: Swipe past confusing ads. In just 30 seconds, see exactly how our undergarments fit, feel, and stay in place all day.
visual_concept: Short, fast-cut explainer video with text overlays: 'No digging', 'No marks', 'All–day breathable'. Clear before/after scenes and minimal talking.
offer: Sitewide discount for a limited time
rationale: Addresses weak video performance by simplifying the message into a short, benefit-first explainer that can work for colder, broad audiences.
